name: Toormix
description: Toormix is a design studio based in Barcelona working to help clients boost their business through design. Founded in 2000 by Oriol Armengou and Ferran Mitjans, the company is an experienced team that works in close collaboration with local and international clients with a clear focus on innovation and brand development. They are consultants for ideas that help companies gain value, be more visible and achieve greater success.
